ygData.subject: Re: Finally talking to Megaton/Constructicons Decision
ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton held up a hand in a Decepticon salute, Yes, this unity will prove to be extremely fatal. The mutants thoughts strayed towards his own goals, Havotron

Megaton held up a hand in a Decepticon salute, "Yes, this unity will prove
to be extremely fatal." The mutants thoughts strayed towards his own goals,
Havotron thought he was going to be the superior unit to replace Megatron
but the warped figure knew that only an upgraded leadership unit such as
himself could lead the two groups to victory.
----- Original Message -----
From: <gunthers@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 12, 2001 12:11 PM
Subject: Re: Finally talking to Megaton/Constructicons Decision


> Havotron broke into a evil laugh.  "Mwa haha. Yes, I can accept
> that, just as much as you can.  Megatron has not conqured this
> miserable planet for milleniums, and I have come to, 'relieve' him of
> his duty's.  Unfortuanatly, he did what I never thought he would.
> RAN" he screamed. "THE COWARD.  But you Megaton,
> welcoome to the D.E.D.  Let this unity prove to be fatal, to all but
> us."  'For now.' he thought the last part.
>
> "Decepticons, back to base" he ordered.
>
